assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Scinex Corporation engages in media, ICT solution, logistics, and healthcare businesses in Japan and internationally. The company publishes my town encyclopedia and telepal 50; and convenience book, child rearing guide, health information, and city information guides. It also provides ICT solutions, such as CityDO!, a local information site; hometown tax payment site; local video portal site; My Town Tokusan Net, an e-commerce site; tours on the internet; B2B portal site for restaurant; my town artificial intelligence chatbot; Sirel, a marketplace that connects local companies and stores; a cloud based CMS for administrative purpose; My town app; My town customer app; My town NAVI; and digital signage solutions. In addition, it offers DM delivery and posting services. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Chiyoda, Japan.
